text: niṅṅaḷ nanma pravartticcāl atinṟe guṇaṁ niṅṅaḷkkutanneyāṇ. tinma ceytāl atinṟe dēāṣavuṁ niṅṅaḷkkutanne. niṅṅaḷe aṟiyicca raṇṭu sandarbhaṅṅaḷil avasānattētinṟe samayamāyappēāḷ niṅṅaḷe maṟṟu śatrukkaḷ kīḻppeṭutti; avar niṅṅaḷuṭe mukhaṁ cīttayākkānuṁ ādyatavaṇa paḷḷiyil kaṭannuvannapēāle ittavaṇayuṁ kaṭannucellānuṁ kayyil kkiṭṭiyatellāṁ takarttukaḷayānuṁ vēṇṭi
